End Of The Networksolutions Tyranny

07 Jul 1999

The Internet Corp. for Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN) Wednesday added 15 companies to its roster of accreditation qualifiers, with the new batch joining the turbulent market of domain registrars. Check out the story on their site. I really see them as the 'Good' side of the domain name force and NSI as the 'dark' side. Good news for anyone that wants to register a domain name in the future.
